name: Date Fighter
description:
***************************
PRESENTATION
***************************
This game was made in Jam for the Ludum Dare 41.
Theme : Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

This game is a dating sim and fight game. 2 players fight each other to have time to talk with a girl, and probably seduce her…

Fight features :

- oriented attack
- charged attack
- double jump
- shield

Special feature :
You can block your opponent in trees for a few seconds by throwing him at the branchs, so you can talk with the girl easier!

To be able to talk to the girl, stay with her 2 seconds.

Please feel free to ask us any question or give us suggestions through comments :)

***************************
CONTROLS
***************************

It’s recommended to play with Xbox 360 controller (controls are indicated in game).

Keyboard controls :

Player 1 :

-WASD/ZQSD : Move the player

-R : Attack (maintain to charge the attack)

-T : Defense

-Y : Jump (use while in air to double jump)

Player 2 :

-Arrows : Move the player

-1 : Attack (maintain to charge the attack)

-2 : Defense

-3 : Jump (use while in air to double jump)
